text: The micro-investing app must implement an AI-powered feature (flagged as aiPicksV1) launching 1 June 2025, that surfaces no more than five plain-language, emoji-free stock ideas daily—each passing FINRA “communication with the public” standards and logged in compliance_feed_audit—with the feed accessible exclusively to verified users aged 18–30.

structured_data.summary: Surface ≤5 stock ideas daily using AI model
structured_data.additionalNotes: Feature must generate a limited number of daily stock picks to avoid information overload and maintain relevance.

structured_data.summary: Ensure captions are plain-language and emoji-free
structured_data.additionalNotes: Requirement ensures accessibility and compliance with formal financial communication norms.

structured_data.summary: Pass all suggestions through FINRA communication review
structured_data.additionalNotes: All AI-suggested content must comply with FINRA Rule 2210 on communications with the public.
Log entries should support future audits and internal oversight of recommendation compliance.

structured_data.summary: Restrict feed access to verified users aged 18–30
structured_data.additionalNotes: Feature targets specific demographic; must enforce age and verification checks.

structured_data.summary: Implement feature flag aiPicksV1 for rollout
structured_data.additionalNotes: Feature flag enables controlled deployment and testing prior to full launch.
origin: implied – Date establishes a fixed deadline for readiness and deployment.
